name: project
description: * npm init -y * npm install -g yarn * yarn add webpack webpack-cli --dev  ##添加webpack.config.js 配置文件  配置文件中添加`module.exports = {mode:'production'}` * yarn add webpack-dev-server --dev * yarn add --dev html-webpack-plugin ``` 配置文件添加  const HtmlWebpackPlugin = require('html-webpack-plugin') module.exports = {   entry: 'index.js',   output: {     path: __dirname + '/dist',     filename: 'index_bundle.js'   },   plugins: [     new HtmlWebpackPlugin()   ] } ``` * npx webpack-dev-server
